title: Interpretation of cleaning fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: To meet the interpretation of cleaning fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail, fish is considered one of the marine creatures that God has blessed man with and made it a food with good taste. It has many nutritional benefits for health and the body, so many people accept it and enjoy its taste in all cooking methods. Whether it is grilled, fried, or stewed. The fish must be cleaned well inside and out before you start cooking and eating it, but what do I see in a dream that I am cleaning fish? We will learn this in detail in the following article from the encyclopedia. Interpretation of cleaning fish in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained in his interpretation of the vision of cleaning fish In a dream, it is an indication of the abundance of sustenance, blessings, and gifts that will be presented to the dreamer, and it is also an indication of the lawful money that the dreamer possesses, so God will bless it. Also, seeing cleaning a large amount of fish indicates that the dreamer will gain a lot of financial gains in a short period of time. In While the vision of cleaning a small amount of fish, not exceeding 5 fish, indicates the appearance of a number of women in the visionary’s life. The vision of cleaning the stomach of a fish and finding a ring in it indicates that the dreamer will gain a prominent position in his work. And whoever sees himself cleaning a fish, he finds a fish in it. Another, his vision indicates that he will marry a woman, and if he finds two fish, he will marry two women, and God knows best. Seeing cleaning fish with a soft belly and smooth texture indicates one of the women in the fortuneteller’s life. Cleaning fish scales in a dream. Seeing a man or woman cleaning fish scales above indicates the large number of fraudsters and corrupt people surrounding the viewer. He should be careful not to interfere with them and get rid of them by severing his relationship with them. In the vision of cleaning fish from their scales, this is a sign that the dreamer has acquired a prominent position and high positions at work. If the dreamer is sick, then seeing him is a sign of recovery from illness and enjoyment of health and well-being, God willing. God. This vision also expresses the dreamer’s strong will and determination to get rid of the wrong things in his life. Cleaning fish in a dream for single women. Seeing in a dream that they are cleaning raw fish for single women means that they will be able to get rid of sadness and achieve what they have always wanted, which is Dreams and aspirations. Whoever sees in her dream that she is cleaning a lot of fish, she has many dreams and aspirations that she seeks to achieve in this world. Seeing a large fish cleaning in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will get a lot of money or get married soon, and God knows best. And whoever sees that she is cleaning a lot of fish She cleans and cooks fish in her dream, may God bless her with success in this world and she will be able to achieve her dreams. Cleaning dead fish in a person’s dream indicates that he has been liberated from feelings of sadness and sorrow and that he will welcome a new life full of hope and optimism. Cleaning fish in a dream for a pregnant woman To dream of cleaning fish and eating it It means for a pregnant woman that God will give her a lot of sustenance and her life will be happy and stable in the coming days. In seeing a pregnant woman cleaning fish

In seeing a pregnant woman cleaning fish

title: Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream

preview.html: But there are many interpretations of seeing teeth falling out, which can mean good or bad, and vary depending on what the person saw in his dream and depending on the person himself. In this article we will explain the different interpretations of seeing teeth falling out in a dream. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out for single people if an unmarried girl sees If a married woman dreams that all her teeth are falling out, this means that she is in dire need of marriage or someone to exchange feelings of love with her. However, if an unmarried girl sees that her front teeth are falling out and she is associated with someone in a love relationship or engagement, this indicates that this person is deceiving her and will leave her and will not Be serious about marriage. But if she sees that her front teeth have fallen out for a year, this indicates that her heart will be attached to many people, but this person will not care about her and will not propose to her. Seeing teeth falling out on a married womanIf a married woman dreams that her teeth are falling out and she does not have Children, this dream indicates that she wishes God to bless us with children and to have children soon, God willing. But if a married woman dreams that she has children and in a dream that teeth are falling out, this indicates her great concern for her children and her husband. Interpretation of teeth falling out by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that it is the saying That all his upper teeth have fallen out and only one tooth remains in the upper jaw, this indicates that the person with vision will face problems with someone very close to him and may interrupt him. However, if the dreamer sees all his lower teeth falling out and only one tooth remains in the bottom of his mouth, then this is considered good news. Because it indicates that the dreamer will get rid of an enemy who wants to harm him severely. As for the one who sees all the teeth falling out of his hand one after the other, this indicates that the person with vision will live a long life and reach the weakest age until all his teeth fall out and he will see many children. And grandchildren. And if someone sees that his teeth are falling out and gives them to another person, this means that the dreamer will borrow some money from the one who gives him his teeth and will not be able to pay. Interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing them falling out. If a pregnant woman sees that her teeth are falling out, this indicates the seriousness of her fear of the pain of childbirth and her fear of bearing Responsibility for a small child after birth. However, if a pregnant woman sees that her husband’s teeth are falling out, this means that her husband will not support her and help her in her dream, and her husband’s neglect during this period of need for his care will lead to many problems between them. For those who have a vision and want to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article on the Shamloul website.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the name Saber in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the name Saber in a dream You, dear reader, can find out the interpretations of scholars related to the interpretation of a dream about the name Saber in a dream. All this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about the name Saber in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Saber in a dream could be a signal to give up patience, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married man sees the name Saber, this may mean his freedom from stress, and God knows best. Likewise, if a married woman sees the name Saber. This may indicate staying away from anger and anger, and God knows the unseen. When you see a young man, the name Saber expresses endurance and strength, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the name Ahlam in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Ahlam in a dream can indicate aspiration for the best, and God knows the unseen. In case the dreamer sees the name Ahlam It may lead to abandoning patience, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the name of dreams can also express the pursuit of desires, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. In the event that a married man sees the dream name, it may mean that he gets rid of his problems with his wife, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Afaf in a dream. Interpretation of a dream The name Afaf in a dream can indicate purity, and God knows the unseen. However, if a married woman sees the name Afaf, it may indicate her purity and chastity, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a divorced woman sees the name Afaf, it indicates purity, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees the name Afaf, This may be a sign of good qualifications. Interpretation of a dream about the name Majid in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Majid in a dream could be evidence of good changes, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees the name Majid, this is evidence of achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees the name Majid, it indicates luck, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees the name Majid in a dream, it may represent freedom from problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the name Farida in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Farida in a dream could be an indication of nutrition, God willing. If a married woman sees the name Farida, it may indicate goodness and livelihood, and God knows best. Likewise, if she sees An unmarried girl's name is Farida, as this may indicate the rare personality she has, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees the name Farida, it may express the valuable things he acquires, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Nabil in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Nabil in a dream could be An indication of good qualities, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married man, the name Nabil can indicate honesty and honesty, and God knows best. If a married woman sees the name Nabil in a dream, it may be an indication of honor, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Mustafa in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Mustafa In a dream, it can indicate a good life, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a married man, the name Mustafa can indicate the fulfillment of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a dear person while he is alive

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a dear person while he is alive: Every person in this life has lost someone dear to him and who controlled his thoughts for a long time, and he can also see this dead person in his dream, but one of the dreams that people see in the faces of their loved ones is a vision of a living person dying in a dream, and they ask About the interpretation of this dream and its meaning for the dreamer, so we will meet through a different site in the interpretation of a dream about the death of a dear person while he is alive. Interpretation of the dream about the death of a dear person while he is alive: Death in dreams generally indicates that the dreamer will begin a new phase in his life, whether it is on the level Practical, family, or even emotional. If a person sees in a dream that one of his relatives has died, this means that the dreamer is jealous of him. The death of the father in the dream is evidence that the dreamer fears harm for his father. The priest crying loudly over the death of his father is evidence of the many worries that he is exposed to. Dream owner: The death of a friend with great sadness for him while he is alive indicates that relief from anxiety, sadness, and trouble is at hand. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a dear person alive for a single girl: An unmarried girl dreams of someone she does not know and she died in the dream without signs of sadness, crying, or screaming. It is one of the good visions because it indicates the approaching marriage. The death of the preacher while he lives for the unmarried girl symbolizes her intense love for him. If an unmarried girl sees the death of her brother in a dream, this means that money will come to her. If an unmarried woman dreams that she died in her dream, this is evidence of many problems and difficulties that She faces her in her dream. The death of an unmarried fiancé also indicates the approaching date of marriage. If she sees a close friend of hers dead in her dream, this is evidence of an impending trick. Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone she loves while she is alive for a married woman: The scholar Ibn Sirin explains the death of a living person in a married woman’s dream, and it was Fair and trustworthy. Seeing a loved one alive and dead means that goodness and abundance are coming. If she sees that she died in a dream and was not buried without grief, then the dream indicates the end of sadness and anxiety and the stability of her life. The vision can bring news to a married woman that she will soon become pregnant and give birth easily. It indicates death The living husband indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Hearing the news of her mother’s death indicates that the mother is just and has a strong religion. Interpretation of the death of a lover for a pregnant woman: The meaning of the dream for a pregnant woman is that she will hear happy news from a close person. Seeing the death of a close friend shows the difficulty of her pregnancy and the difficulty of giving birth. The death of a family member In a pregnant woman’s dream, it is a sign of the arrival of a male child. The death of one of her relatives in her dream means that her husband gets a lot of money and a lot of livelihood. If she sees her husband dying, the dream indicates the stability of marital life between them and the happiness that she experiences. The death of a sister while she is living in the world in the woman’s dream The pregnant woman heralds the arrival of happiness for this woman. The death of a living father shows the ability of this pregnant woman to face difficulties. As for the death of an intimate neighbor, it is a sign of goodness and blessing. Interpretation

title: What is the interpretation if I dreamed that my father died?

preview.html: I dreamed that my father died. The dream of the death of a father is considered one of the painful dreams that a person sees in his sleep and makes him feel very sad and makes him want to wake up immediately and get away from this pain that he feels, and many resort to it. The interpretation is that the vision, and for this reason we will explain in this article the interpretation of a dream about the death of a father. I dreamed that my father died. I dreamed that my father died, so what is the interpretation of the dream? We find that some people say that I dreamed of the death of my father, and experts interpret this vision in different ways according to the feeling that the dreamer is experiencing, as if His crying was weak, it could bring him good news and kindness, while his crying was strong. Crying in a dream is not a sign of happiness. It is possible to interpret a dream that my father died in several ways, because this dream has different interpretations, and some interpreters say that it is a sign of instability and psychological turmoil that the dreamer experiences during the period of seeing it as a result. Some bad events that affected him. It can be said according to the opinion of different experts that the person who sees this vision receives success and protection from God because he defends him from those who persecute him and honors him in his life. In the event that the dreamer sees that his father suffers from a serious illness and as a result of his death, This vision can be interpreted as a serious illness in reality, which will change his condition to the most difficult, and he will become unable to work or interact with those around him. It is possible that this dream is an expression of the intense interest that the father pays to the son in reality and his great concern for his son’s well-being. And providing great goodness, and this happens if the dreamer is at a young age. Sen. I dreamed that my father died at the hands of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees the death of his father in a dream and in reality suffers from many conflicts as a result of his need for attention and money will get what he wants because someone close to him will provide him with the help he needs. He needs. If a person sees that his father has died in a dream and feels extremely sad, this indicates the state of weakness that he is experiencing in reality and the severe anxiety that he suffers from, which makes him unable to face life’s problems. If he sees the death of his father and does not feel anything in the dream That is, he did not feel sad about it, as the vision is an indication of the improvement of circumstances that are passing for the better and of his life. Surviving attacks and recovering from illness if the disease afflicts him. For a person, the dream can be interpreted as saying that there is a big secret that his father has been hiding for a long time and trying not to reveal, and it is possible for this secret to appear after the dream, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin says that if there is a major conflict Between a boy and his father in a dream that led to his father’s death, this vision is interpreted as a bad relationship between the two in reality, especially with regard to the boy, so he must be kind to his father so that he does not regret it afterwards. The father’s death in the dream and his return to life again It is not a good sign, because it shows the serious mistakes that the father commits in reality and his burden of many sins and serious sins. I dreamed that my father died for single people. If a girl sees an unmarried

title: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and staying alive for single people

preview.html: When salvation from drowning comes, it is a mercy from God, repentance, and getting out of a difficult situation. In the following lines by our translator, we will learn about the positive and negative meanings of dreaming of drowning in the sea, so stay with us. Interpretation of dreams of seeing drowning in the sea and surviving it for a single girl: Seeing yourself drowning in the sea indicates many negative meanings in an unmarried girl’s dream, especially if the water is turbid or stagnant. Drowning in murky water is evidence of many sins and gossip. The company of bad companions and preoccupation with the world, and God knows best. It represents seeing yourself drowning in the sea and not being able to breathe in a dream. A lot of negative emotions and excessive anxiety about the future. Seeing yourself drowning in a dream can It is linked to getting rid of a failed romantic relationship. It is unequal in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. Seeing yourself drowning in a dream means that the dreamer will be exposed to difficult health conditions. It will make her unable to live her normal life for some time. It is said that drowning in water in a dream is a sign of an unjust marriage. Stable. Who goes through many problems and crises but continues in the end. To see being saved from drowning in a person’s dream indicates justice in this world and the hereafter, and sincere repentance for the sake of God. And being saved from drowning in the dream of a girl who failed miserably in exams. Good news for success. And obtaining average grades and results. Seeing surviving drowning in a dream means recovering from illness. It also expresses postponing the decision to marry indefinitely. See also: Interpretation of swimming in the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing drowning in the sea and surviving from it in a dream for a woman. For a married woman, seeing drowning in the sea indicates a comfortable life, neglect of the husband, wife, and children, and neglect of their rights, which negatively affects the family. Drowning in stagnant water leads to a routine life full of pressures and burdens. As for murky water, it indicates gossip and slander, and God knows best. If a woman dreams that her husband He is drowning. He suffers from many burdens and demands that weigh him down and make him full of worries and absences. When a woman sees one of her sons in a dream as if he is drowning in the sea. This is an unpleasant vision, and is interpreted as illness or a deviation in the son’s behavior, and God knows best. Surviving drowning in a dream is a vision Positive expression that expresses freedom from troubles and worries and the return of security and stability in the home and family again. Interpretation of seeing a man drowning in the sea and being saved from it in a dream and its meaning. Imam Ibn Sirin says that drowning in a dream is evidence of indulging in sins, as well as the removal of guidance and the path of truth, and God knows best. Whether she survives drowning in the dream, this indicates a new opportunity for repentance, guidance, and walking on the path of righteousness and drawing closer to God Almighty. When a man appears to be helping his wife survive drowning, he cares about her welfare and always directs her toward the right and right. If one sees in his dream saving his daughter from Drowning. This is evidence that the dreamer will support his daughter and help her get rid of her worries and problems. Drowning in the patient’s dream is a sign of approaching death.

title: Interpretation of jumping in a dream The meaning of jumping from a place in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a single woman jumping, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married and unmarried man, both from the roof of the house into the water, jumping from the top, falling, I dreamed that he was jumping, and more by Ibn Sirin for jumping. Interpretation of the dream of jumping from the roof of the house or from a high place, as well as crawling in a dream, and what is the meaning of these dreams that We see it in a dream. Jumping in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing the same person in a dream jumping with one leg because of an injury or illness that befell him means loss, failure, exhaustion, and unhappiness. And whoever sees himself jumping from one place to another, this indicates a change in his situation for the better in general, as it may be... In money, living, social or emotional life, and whoever sees himself jumping from the ground and reaching heaven, this is an indication of the journey that brings him goodness, blessing and justice, and it is a harbinger of the marriage of a single person. Psychologists and sociologists say that most dreams related to jumping, jumping and flying are A reflection of an emotion that preoccupies the viewer, full of anxiety and fear of failure or making mistakes and portending the imminent achievement of success and victory, and it is also a sign of ambition, seriousness and diligence. Jumping from high to low Seeing him jumping from a high and noble place to another, less high place is an indication of the dreamer’s prestigious position and elevation. Whoever dreams that he is jumping over someone or jumping and running over another person, then the dreamer or the one who is jumping, jumping, or jumping in the dream will have the upper hand over the other. And whoever sees in a dream that he is jumping and jumping from the ground to the sky, the dream indicates that he will reach Mecca for Hajj or Umrah or as a blessing for him in his religious and worldly affairs. The predicted area is better or worse if it is bad, and it has been said in a dream about jumping and jumping in a dream that whoever jumps to the top and sees himself rising from the ground, will die and his funeral will be held. A big jump in a dreamAs for seeing a big and high jump in a dream, for example, Like the dreamer jumping from earth to heaven, it is a sign of spiritual and moral elevation, correct thinking, elevation, and the ability to make the right decisions in critical situations. Moment, and take advantage of opportunities to succeed and reach dreams. Sports jumping in a dream. Seeing someone jumping and jumping using a pole or long jump, such as what we see in sports competitions and Olympic events such as show jumping, horse jumping, etc., is an indication of the great achievement that the dreamer will achieve in the end result. In the near future, his perseverance and work. I dream of jumping with one foot. Jumping with one foot for the solution is an indication of a will that lacks determination and work, which means the viewer’s insistence on achieving his dream and his effort, but there are challenges and obstacles that stand in his way and frustrate his persistence. A dream about jumping from a high place. Seeing jumps from high places is considered such as Waterfalls or giant skyscrapers are a sign of success, balance and ambition, if the viewer does not hesitate to jump and his position is in the right place after the jump is completed. However, if he sees that he is in an inappropriate position

title: Interpretation of distributing sweets in a dream is the correct and complete interpretation

preview.html: Below we present an article on the Encyclopedia website about the interpretation of distributing sweets in a dream. Since the world of visions is a large and vast world with many connotations and meanings, there is no one on earth who dreams and worries about his dream. Al-Saffat on the tongue of the Prophet of God Abraham, when he said to his son in Al-Saffat, verse 102: “And when he had reached the end of the journey, he said, ‘O my son, I see in a dream that I am slaughtering you, so look at your sanctuary. Illuminate your sanctuary.’ Paraesthesia. God Almighty spoke the truth, and more than that, it was revealed to Moses’ mother that she must accept it as a flame, because only God knows the secret behind this world and its purpose, while what we know about it is the interpretation of some symbols as stated by the tongues of some of the prophets whom God endowed with an interpretation. Visions or interpretations of scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Tell us some interpretations and good news. Interpretation of distributing sweets in a dream. Find out the interpretation below: Distributing sweets in a dream, as it is considered one of the praiseworthy visions that people may not be able to interpret in their dreams. Below we will explain in detail the signs that appear in the dream to the public: Candy in a dream indicates wonderful nutrition. Without misery.Candy in a dream symbolizes a beautiful girl who adorns and adorns a man’s life.Sweets in a dream indicate great profit.Sweets in a dream are interpreted as security, calm, and psychological stability.Seeing distributing sweets to children in a dreamLearn more about distributing sweets to children in a dreamBecause Children are God’s beloved, the smile of the heart, the comfort of homes, stability and security for mothers, and a refuge for fathers. Here we will learn together about the meaning of distributing sweets to children in a dream: Distributing sweets to children in a dream indicates great happiness and great joy. Distributing sweets to children in one dream symbolizes a lot of goodness and abundance. Distributing sweets to children in a dream is considered great goodness and sustenance without misery. Sweets distributed to children in a dream symbolize giving and kindness. Distributing sweets in a dream to adults indicates good and successful relationships in the life of the fortuneteller. Distributing sweets to children in a married woman’s dream indicates her success and the success of her family in life. Sweets distributed to children in a woman’s dream indicates On great happiness and hope of conceiving soon a blessed child. Seeing yourself distributing sweets to children in a dream means stability and security. Giving sweets in a dream to a single woman. A single girl always wants to live happily and looks forward to a promising future and beautiful days as she always imagines her partner with good qualities, beauty and manhood and hopes for A job after difficult school years. Candy in one’s dream is interpreted as one of the praiseworthy visions. Candy in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes happy news that will strike her ears and sweetness and happiness in her heart. Sweets in an unmarried girl’s dream denote the fulfillment of desires and a happy marriage Soon. Candy in a man's dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of seeing flies in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Flying in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees that flies stick to her dress or fall on her body, then the flies here indicate that this woman is greedy towards those close to her, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. But if a married woman sees that flies enter the house, the kitchen, the bedrooms, or the reception, then this It indicates that there are problems on the way, but they will disappear quickly because flies are insects that die quickly and are easy to get rid of. If a married woman sees that she is spraying an insecticide on flies to get rid of them, then the dream here indicates that the woman will be able to get rid of current problems. Interpretation of the vision Flies by Ibn Sirin: If the sleeper sees that he is killing flies, then the dream deserves praise because it indicates the approaching elimination of troubles and problems. As for the one who sees in his dream that the flies entered his mouth or ear, the dream here indicates that the sleeper has a strong relationship with bad friends. Whoever sees in his dream that the flies descend On him, this means that he is afraid of being robbed and robbed. Interpretation of flies in a man’s dream: Flies in a dream in general are harmful, but if the sleeper sees that they kill him, the difficulties will end, and if the person sees in his dream that he caught flies and did not kill them, then the sleeper unfortunately has many different sins. He must repent. But if a man sees flies in a dream, it is a sign of forbidden money, and God knows best. But if a man sees that flies are always hovering around him, in the interpretation of the dream, then the man is indulging in pleasures. But if the man sees that he is eating flies, then the dream indicates that The sleeper can walk among people talking, gossiping, and lying. Interpretation of flies in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees flies falling on a pillow or pillow, then the dream here indicates that the girl is surrounded by many greedy people and liars, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. But if he sees an unmarried woman Married, a fly flies over his head, but he cannot kill it and get rid of it, because the dream here means that the girl has an evil person chasing her. And if an unmarried woman sees that there are a lot of flies hovering around her, then unfortunately there is bad, sad, or harmful news that she will hear soon. The flies are Insignificant, insignificant and very small harmful insects, which can be eliminated very easily, but in dreams they can carry stronger interpretations than their value in this world.
